question:
Mechanization of agriculture will lead to which of the following?
(1) Higher per unit cost of operation
(2) Higher per unit productivity
(3) Higher dose of employment
(4) Higher utilization of resources
Select the correct answer from codes given below:
explanation: Besides improving production efficiency, mechanization encourages large scale production and improves the quality of farm produce. On the other hand, it displaces unskilled farm labor, causes environmental pollution, deforestation and erosion.
